mapper.select:
SELECT t.uid, t.id, t.document_number, t.apply_date, t.city_firm, t.operator_name, t.contract_title, t.contract_style, t.contract_pricing_method, t.for_company, t.contract_type, t.cost_type, t.supplier, t.contract_amount, t.party_a_amount, t.party_b_amount, t.both_agreed_amount, t.dispute_description, t.approval_status, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.supplier, t.alert_node, t.other
,op1.operation_name,op1.by_operation_people_id
FROM
t_oa_cost_disputeclaims t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{param.ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_cost_disputeclaims t on op.uid=t.uid
t.id =#{param.id}
and t.document_number LIKE concat('%',#{param.documentNumber},'%')
and t.city_firm LIKE concat('%',#{param.cityFirm},'%')
and t.apply_date LIKE concat('%',#{param.applyDate},'%')
and t.operator_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.operatorName},'%')
and t.supplier LIKE concat('%',#{param.supplier},'%')
and t.alert_node =#{param.alertNode}
and statistics_city_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.statisticsCityName},'%')
and t.has_read =#{param.hasRead}
and t.monitor_status =#{param.monitorStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(t.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t.approval_status = #{param.approvalStatus}
order by t.update_time desc

SELECT count(*) total, count(case when has_read = 'beread' then 1 end) beread, count(case when monitor_status = 'special_attention' then 1 end) specialAttention, count(case when monitor_status = 'warning' then 1 end) warning, count(case when monitor_status = 'normal' then 1 end) normal FROM ( SELECT t.id, t.document_number, t.apply_date, t.city_firm, t.operator_name, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.alert_node FROM
t_oa_cost_disputeclaims t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{countParam.ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_cost_disputeclaims t on op.uid=t.uid
) oa
oa.id =#{countParam.id}
and oa.document_number LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.documentNumber},'%')
and oa.city_firm LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.cityFirm},'%')
and oa.apply_date LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.applyDate},'%')
and oa.operator_name LIKE concat('%',#{countParam.operatorName},'%')

select statistics_city_name, SUM(both_agreed_amount) bothAgreedAmount from t_oa_cost_disputeclaims where statistics_city_name is not null
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY statistics_city_name
